meanings.definition: To use or develop (something) to get something else that has greater value
meanings.sent1: She was parlaying her skills to land a better job.
meanings.sent2: He is parlaying his savings into a new business venture.
meanings.sent3: By parlaying her love for baking, she turned it into a successful bakery.
meanings.sent4: The artist parlayed his passion for painting into a lucrative career.
meanings.sent5: Parlaying her determination, she achieved her dream of becoming a published author.

meanings.definition: To bet or gamble (an original stake and its winnings) on a subsequent race, contest, etc.
meanings.sent1: He was parlaying his luck on the final horse race of the day.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys parlaying her winnings on the next round of poker.
meanings.sent3: Parlaying his good fortune, he decided to try his luck at the casino.
meanings.sent4: The gambler parlayed his initial bet into a substantial sum of money.
meanings.sent5: By parlaying his bets wisely, he managed to double his earnings at the blackjack table.
